channel.title: spatial on FRB-CESAB
channel.description: Recent content in spatial on FRB-CESAB

item.title: robinmap
item.author: nicolas.casajus@fondationbiodiversite.fr (FRB-CESAB)
item.description: The goal of the R package robinmap is to map World countries in the Robinson projection system (or others CRS) centered on a different meridian than Greenwich. It uses the Natural Earth layer as a base map.

item.title: worldpa
item.author: nicolas.casajus@fondationbiodiversite.fr (FRB-CESAB)
item.description: The package worldpa is an interface to the World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA) hosted on the Protected planet website. It allows users to download spatial shapefiles of protected areas for world countries using the WDPA API.
